# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia function wrap_string(text::String; text_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(text, " ")
    lines = String[]
    line = ""

    for word in words
        if length(word) + length(line) > text_width
            push!(lines, line)
            line = String(word)
        else
            line *= word * " "
        end
    end

    push!(lines, line)
    join(lines, "\n")
end

# Example
wrap_string("The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.", 15)
```

Output:

```
"The quick brown fox jumps over
 the lazy dog."
```
